tooltip.auto_workbench_guide:
Crafts items automatically.
The left grid is used to set the recipe, the right grid is the storage.
tooltip.placer_guide:
Places blocks right in front of it.
Needs redstone signal.
tooltip.harvester_guide:
Harvests the crop right in front of it.
Needs redstone signal.
tooltip.transporter_guide: Transports items from the container in front of it to the container behind it.
tooltip.filter_guide:
Filters items.
The yellow slot is for configuration, the other slot will accept only the configured item.
tooltip.user_guide:
Uses the block in front of it.
Needs redstone signal.
tooltip.transpositioner_guide: Teleports the entities in front of it to the linked transpositioner.
tooltip.transpositioner_remote_guide: Right-Click on two transpositioners to link them.
tooltip.portable_transpositioner_guide: Right-Click to teleport. Shift + Right-Click to fill the Portable Transpositioner with Ender Pearls.
tooltip.armor_collector:
Collects the target's armor.
Needs redstone signal.
tooltip.armor_injector:
Injects armor to the target.
Needs redstone signal.
tooltip.tree_cutter: Chops the tree in front of it. Its max range is 5 blocks (not counting height).
messages.transpositioner.saved: The location of this transpositioner is saved.
